pylayers.antprop.slab.Interface.plotwrta¶

Interface.plotwrta(k=0, display='modulus', name='', dB=False)[source]¶

plot R & T coefficients with respect to angle

Parameters :

k : frequency index

display : string

{‘modulus’|’phase’}

dB : boolean

False

Examples

>>> from pylayers.antprop.slab import *
>>> import numpy as np
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> theta = np.arange(0,np.pi/2,0.01)
>>> fGHz  = np.arange(0.1,10,0.2)
>>> sl  = SlabDB('simul9.mat','simul9.slab')
>>> mat = sl.mat
>>> air = mat['AIR']
>>> brick  = mat['BRICK']
>>> II  = MatInterface([air,brick],0,fGHz,theta)
>>> II.RT()
>>> fig = plt.figure()
>>> II.plotwrta(0)
>>> plt.show()

(Source code)
